alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 11:30PM CDT until June 10 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1130 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Vinson to 5 miles northwest of Childress, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Mangum, Quanah, Hollis, Granite, Blair, Chillicothe, Olustee, Eldorado, Martha, Gould, Elmer, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Vinson, Warren, Medicine Mound, Humphreys, Odell and Duke. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
